Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI doesn't seem to have enough knowledge for content-specific feedback. But can help with some content generation and writing feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI feedback is obviously less personal and so less emotional

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback tends to only happen after something is submitted and marked. And so the context is different
